definition[0]: a very long period of time
example[0]: It’s years since I rode a bike.
example[1]: I haven’t been there for years.
example[2]: It was the first time in years I’d seen her.
note[1]: getting on in years (=no longer young)
example[3]: Gordon is very active for a man of his years.
note[2]: a man/woman/person etc of his/her etc years
definition[2]: a particular period of time in someone’s life or in history
example[4]: the difficult years following the war
example[5]: Sheila enjoyed her years as a student in Oxford.
